msbt.message: Thank goodness the fireworks show finally started. I don't know how much more anticipation I could take. I was starting to cheer every time I heard a door slam or a balloon pop! Now let's go make some memories!
Look, . Look!No, not at me. Look up at the sky. It's simply dazzling, .Sights like these always take my breath away, .
It must take a lot of time and coordination to put together a big fireworks show like this one. All the more reason to enjoy it to its fullest, !
I feel so lucky that we get to watch these fireworks together.Good company makes all the difference at events like these.
Wow. Double wow. Triple wow!EXTRA WOW!Is it just me, or is each firework better than the last? I honestly can't pick a favorite, !
I'm so impressed by these fireworks! What a proud moment for everyone living here on .

I just had the most amazing idea. I'm going to recreate this exact fireworks showusing only desserts! A pan of brownies could represent the night sky, and candy is the clear choice for the fireworks themselves. But the big question is, how do I work in ?Maybe the answer will come to me during the big finale, .
I'm having so much fun!I wasn't sure you'd be able to hear me over the fireworks, but maybe I overdid it, .
I just wish I could stay in this moment forever and ever It's all just so beautiful, ! Excuse me. There's nothing like a grand finale to get the waterworks going, is there?
I can't believe we're nearing the end of the show alreadyI'm going to try to remember every last second of it, .Even if that means not blinking until the very last firework lights up the night sky!
The fireworks tonight have been especially beautiful. One day we'll reminisce about this night
